text:
@GOPChairwoman @GOP @realDonaldTrump Three months since Trump was informed about coronavirus and hospitals are just now getting test kits. South Korea was testing tens of thousands daily when Trump was still calling it a hoax.

Americans will die because of Donald Trump and the clowns who blindly defend him.

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
